abstract: Scrapblog, the scrapbooking Web site, announced Monday that it had raised an undisclosed amount of funds from Steamboat Ventures, the venture capital arm of Walt Disney, as part of its first round of funding. Along with the investment, David Min, principal of Steamboat Ventures, has joined Scrapblog’s board of directors.
lead_paragraph: Scrapblog, the scrapbooking Web site, announced Monday that it had raised an undisclosed amount of funds from Steamboat Ventures, the venture capital arm of Walt Disney, as part of its first round of funding. Along with the investment, David Min, principal of Steamboat Ventures, has joined Scrapblog’s board of directors.

headline.main: Scrapblog Puts Together Funding from Disney’s Steamboat
